entry.title: Andrew J. Evans Jr. (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Andrew J. Evans Jr. (pictured) was the highest-ranking United States Air Force prisoner during the Korean War?

entry.title: Critical Zone (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the film Critical Zone was shot in secret by Ali Ahmadzadeh without permission from Iranian authorities?

entry.title: Muskan Ahirwar (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that nine-year-old Muskan Ahirwar started a library for the children in her slum that now contains more than 3,000 books?

entry.title: MLS Cup in 2023 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Wilfried Nancy became the first Black coach to win the MLS Cup in 2023?

entry.title: Sandra Elkin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Sandra Elkin, discussing basic information on women's topics on Woman, "radicalized" women into supporting women's rights?

entry.title: their Singapore hotel stay (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that some people have asked whether they can pay for their Singapore hotel stay using a travel card?

entry.title: CaptainSparklez (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the YouTuber CaptainSparklez set three Guinness World Records with a Minecraft song parody?

entry.title: their medical-record envelopes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the bad handwriting of British doctors has been blamed on the small size of their medical-record envelopes?
